customer_name: Royal Canin U S A Inc
site_name: ROYAL CANIN U S A INC
narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
The inspection was conducted with IACUC chair, Attending Veterinarian, Animal Operations Manager, Animal Care
Manager - Cat, Animal Care Manager - Dog and various facility personnel. 
The exit interview were conducted with Site Manager, IACUC chair, Attending Veterinarian, Animal Operations
Manager, Operations Manager, Animal Care Manager - Cat, and Animal Care Manager - Dog.
